```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "What.isÂ.ï..your.preferred.time.of.day.to.use.cannabis...Please.select.one."
t <- "What is your preferred time of day to use cannabis? (Please select one)"
q_data <- get_single_selection(data = raw_data, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot<- clean_single_select(q_data)
r <- plot_single_select(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q51_preferred_use_time.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'q51_preferred_use_time_144.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
qf_data <- q_data %>%
  filter(response == "Throughout the day")
```

```{r}
qf_all_data <- 
  qf_data %>%
  inner_join(q_data, by = "id")

qf_n <- length(unique(qf_all_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot <- clean_single_select_y(qf_all_data)
r <- plot_single_select_y(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q51_preferred_use_time.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'q51_preferred_use_time_333.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
